top_comments.comment:
Happy Halloween everyone! 🎃 
Check out "In The Air Tonight" on Violet's channel https://youtu.be/npp_zOrau0w
Given your record of turning songs inside out, should the title have prepared me for the outcome of the video? Yes. Was I somehow still shocked? Also yes 😄  Really well done, all of you.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Happy Halloween everyone! 🎃 
Check out "In The Air Tonight" on Violet's channel https://youtu.be/npp_zOrau0w
You guys are great, and bringing Violet in just elevates each piece.
What a great interpretation! Happy Halloween. Don't let the zombies bite.
Awesome! Though I think you really missed an opportunity to sneak in an Airplane reference by having Violet crash into a jukebox 😉
Second only to A.C.'s cover.
A perfect song for Halloween! ❤❤👍👍
Her voice <3 Great reinterpretation, good job!
Great interpretation of a classic song. At no time did I feel like I was in a Disco (no offense meant to disco). The creepy collaboration continues.
This is sooooooo dope
How do you manage to make all of your work masterpieces? Keep up!
I just wanted to give you a zombie hug!!! 😭😂💙
Everybody gangsta until Melodicka Bros make a metal cover
Anyone thumbs downing this should have their internet restricted by their parents, and then be beaten by a badass metal 🎸.

This is gold-
I love how you guys keep branching into making mini films compressed into a song with your vids

*sees 911 likes*
Hello 911, I'd like to report a murder...

THEY SLAYED IT!
it's the best version of this song out there !!!
Outstanding! HAPPY HALLOWEEN
Given your record of turning songs inside out, should the title have prepared me for the outcome of the video? Yes. Was I somehow still shocked? Also yes 😄  Really well done, all of you.
It's dying alive that's makes a good cover
MY GOD! Best work yet
